edu.cmu.al.util

Interface DBConnectInterface


  • public interface DBConnectInterface
    Author:
    Shuo Zheng, Zhengxiong Zhang The DBConnectInterface interface can connect to the database. Then, it can read data from database and store data into the database. Out interface can also update the existed data in the database.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void closeDB()
      The closeDB() method can close the database connection.
      void connectDB()
      The connectDB() method can connect to the database and get the connection parameter in the class.
      java.util.List<Instance> getData()
      The getData() method can read instance data from the database.
      void storeData(java.lang.String tableName, java.util.List<java.lang.String> columns, java.util.List<Instance> result)
      The storeData() method can build a new table and store the data into the table.
      void updateData(java.lang.String tableName, java.util.List<Instance> data)
      The updateData() method can update the data in the table.

    • Method Detail

      • connectDB

        void connectDB()
        The connectDB() method can connect to the database and get the connection parameter in the class.

      • closeDB

        void closeDB()
        The closeDB() method can close the database connection.

      • getData

        java.util.List<Instance> getData()
        The getData() method can read instance data from the database.
        Returns:
        instance list data, read from the database.

      • storeData

        void storeData(java.lang.String tableName,
             java.util.List<java.lang.String> columns,
             java.util.List<Instance> result)
        The storeData() method can build a new table and store the data into the table.
        Parameters:
        result - Store the result data into the database.

      • updateData

        void updateData(java.lang.String tableName,
              java.util.List<Instance> data)
        The updateData() method can update the data in the table.
        Parameters:
        data - Update the existing data in the table.
